text: Louan Gideon (November 12, 1955 - February 3, 2014) was an American actress. She is best known for her role as Danielle Atron in The Secret World of Alex Mack. She was also in Search for Tomorrow. Gideon died on February 3, 2014 in Asheville, North Carolina from cancer, aged 58.Asheville actress Louan Gideon Dies ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Texas Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Cancer deaths in North Carolina Category:People from Asheville, North Carolina
title: Louan Gideon
